response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This item is not just a product; it's an experience designed to enhance your daily life. Given its unique features and the effort put into its creation, we believe it's worth more than $150. Considering this, I am extending an exclusive offer to you for $180. Should you choose to accept, you'll be enjoying a fantastic deal on a product that promises to exceed your expectations. If you have any questions or need further information, please let me know. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 180}
